# 2025–26 New Taipei Kings season

Thomas Wisman Hung Chih-Shan

The 2025–26 New Taipei Kings season is the franchise's 5th season, its second season in the Taiwan Professional Basketball League (TPBL). On July 5, 2025, the Kings announced that Ryan Marchand left the team for career decision. On July 9, the Kings hired John Patrick as their new head coach. On November 11, the Kings announced to terminate contract relationship with John Patrick. And the Kings named Hung Chih-Shan as their interim head coach after Thomas Wisman, the assistant coach of the New Taipei Kings, coached as interim head coach for one game. The Kings also participated in 2025–26 East Asia Super League as the 2025 TPBL champion.
